results.title: Public Relations
results.description: Job Description This is a job to market physical therapy services and gain referrals. I am an experienced physical therapist with many skills. I am different than most other therapists because I go to people's home to treat them. I am not a Home Health Agency which provides Medicare A in home physical therapy. I am a Medicare B provider giving home care physical therapy. There is a big difference. I am a specialist in rehabilitation. I am looking for someone who is honest, accountable, mature, …
